vlive.korean: [설정 파괴] 요즘 초코랑 김치전 같이 먹는 게...
vlive.english: [Destroyed the script] They eat kimchi-jeon with syrup these days...
SOOBIN's Destroy the Universe Radio begins!

vlive.korean: 제 게 너무 세서 부서진 거예요 친구 게 - 진짜?
vlive.english: Mine was so strong and destroyed my friend's. - Really?

vlive.korean: [자신없어하더니 솜방망이 주먹으로 내 심장 파괴... 나는 지구 파괴...]
vlive.english: [He destroys my heart with those fluffy fists ... I destroy the earth ...]
We were ready to destroy the bad guys.

examples.korean: 뇌세포는 일단 파괴되면 재생이 안 된다.
examples.english: Once destroyed, brain cells do not regenerate.

examples.korean: 그 화재로 대단히 귀중한 골동품들이 소실되었다.
examples.english: Priceless antiques were destroyed in the fire.
Thousands of hectares of forest are destroyed each year.
Men, women and children were slaughtered and villages destroyed.
